## Purpose

S shaped curve for fourndations essay 3

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
theme_set(theme_light())
df <- tibble(x = 1:100) %>% 
  mutate(x = x / 100)

b = 3

df <- df %>% 
  mutate(y = 1/(1+(x/(1-x))^-b))

```


Plot

```{r}

annotations <- tibble(
  x = c(.25, .75),
  y = c(.25, .75),
  label = c(
    "High returns on a low base",
    "Low returns on a high base"
  )
)

df %>%
  ggplot(aes(x, y)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_text(aes(x, y, label = label), data = annotations) +
  labs(
    x = "Investment in education",
    y = "Returns to education"
  ) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = .5, lty = 2, alpha = .5) +
  theme(
    panel.grid = element_blank(),
    axis.text = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks = element_blank()
  )
```
